lead_paragraph: BRESCIA--Donald M.,aged 86, of Riverdale, NY, died peacefully on Wednesday, February 24, 2016 with his spouse John A Spinelli at his side. Born in New Britain, CT, son of the late Vito Brescia and Marie Sinatra Brescia, he and his partner of 59 years lived in Riverdale for the past 54 years. Donald served in the United States Army, a Veteran of the Korean War. Mr. Brescia was an English teacher and Department Chair with the New York City Board of Education and retired as a Teacher Trainer in 1989. Besides his spouse, he is survived by his sister, Marie Delfino. He was predeceased by his brothers Vincent and Thomas. Visiting hours at Riverdale-on-Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Avenue, Bronx, NY, Sunday, February 28th from 2-6pm. Funeral Mass at St. Joseph's of Greenwich Village, 371 Sixth Avenue in Manhattan, February 29th at 10:30am. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to St. Michael's College, Vermont, Covenant House of New York, or The Human Rights Campaign, Washington, DC. Interment Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, NY. 1/3
